content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
        FORMAT_OPTIONS ( 

             FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW = 2,
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE, 
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        ) 
    );
